DOC.brief_summary: Effect intravenous versus intra-peritoneal dexamethasone incidence postoperative nausea vomit follow Laparoscopic gynecological surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Intravenous Versus Intra-peritoneal Dexamethasone Incidence Postoperative Nausea Vomiting
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adult Female patient 2 . American society anesthesiologist class I & II 3 . Undergoing Laparoscopic gynecological surgery 1 . Patient refusal participate study 2 . Patients coagulopathy anticoagulation therapy . 3 . Infection near site needle insertion . 4 . Body mass index > 40kg/m2 5 . Patients neurological neuromuscular disorder history seizure . 6 . Known allergy drug use study .
